channel.title: Bubble on ArcadeBoom
channel.description: Recent content in Bubble on ArcadeBoom

item.title: Bubble Invasion
item.description: Defend your base against the invasion of bubbles. Match 2 or more bubbles of the same color to eliminate them. Don’t let any bubble cross the line! How high can you score? Features: Simple, minimalist bubble shooter theme Endless bubble shooter gameplay Responsive design Use a variety of power ups such as freeze, lightning, explosions and rainbow bubbles to gain a competitive edge

item.title: Teddy Bubble Rescue
item.description: Big Teddy needs your help! Pop the objects to rescue the mini teddy bears. Place your shooter aim carefully to clear the maximum amount of objects in each level. Features: Interactive tutorial 20 challenging levels Fun theme Solve sets using a variety of tactics. Use clever theory of angles, target higher objects and other tactics to solve each level
